General.Name: HYBE Co. Ltd
General.Description: HYBE Co., Ltd. engages in the music production, publishing, and artist development and management businesses. It is also involved in artist concert, original content, and IP and platform activities. The company was formerly known as Big Hit Entertainment Co., Ltd. HYBE Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Yoon  Lenzo
1.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Hybe America
